name: SureRemit
description: SureRemit is a non-cash remittance service provider utilizing the blockchain and the RMT token (build on Stellar) to facilitate global remittances. With SureRemit, the team explains, users purchase and remit vouchers & gift cards, pay bills, send airtime, and donate to charity with ease. SureRemit removes the cash layer by eliminating cash agents leveraging cryptocurrency. SureRemit is part of SureGroup, of which SureGifts and SureCredit are also subsidiaries. The SureRemit team is based in Lagos, London and, Amsterdam.
